InvoiceBatchRunCriteria.name: InvoiceBatchRunCriteria
InvoiceBatchRunCriteria.description: Represents a batch processing job and its required criteria in Subscription Management. During an invoice batch run, all billing schedules that meet the specified criteria are processed, resulting in the generation of invoices.

Comments.description: Optional user-defined information about the batch run criteria.

CriteriaExpression.description: The formula that specifies criteria for filtering the billing schedules. For example, we can filter billing schedules by currency code.

CriteriaMatchType.description: The type of matching criteria required for the batch.

ExpectedInvoiceStatus.description: The type of invoice a batch run generates.

OwnerId.description: System-generated field. The ID of the user who created the BillingBatchScheduler record. Its UI label is Owner.
